title: Your Contact to the University of Technology Nuremberg | UTN

text_sections.section_3: University of Technology Nuremberg Dr.-Luise-Herzberg-Straße 4 90461 Nuremberg
text_sections.section_7: The Bundestag passed the HinSchG with the approval of the Bundesrat on May 12, 2023.
text_sections.section_8: The aim of the HinSchG is to protect persons who have obtained information about criminal offenses or misconduct in a professional context and report or disclose this to a legally designated reporting office from reprisals if the report is justified.
text_sections.section_9: In order to fulfill the legal requirements, an internal reporting office has been set up at the UTN in accordance with § 12 HinSchG.
text_sections.section_10: Reporting a violation of the law or other misconduct is possible via the following channels:
text_sections.section_13: Further information can be found on the website of the Federal Office of Justice (https://www.bundesjustizamt.de/DE/MeldestelledesBundes/MeldestelledesBundes_node.html) . An external reporting office is also operated here, which you can contact as an alternative.
